Cuerpo: An optimal backtrack algorithm for tree-structured constraint satisfaction problems. Presents a top-down algorithm for solving tree-structured constraint satisfaction problems in linear time and evaluates its average-case performance empirically. (Not available on-line) Conference Papers Roberto J. Bayardo Jr. and Daniel P. Miranker . Describes a probabalistic method for predicting costs of first-answer query plans under a modified pipelined-join execution model. cikm96.ps.Z (Compressed PostScript, 92k) Roberto J. Technical Report MCC-INSL-088-96, Microelectronics and Computer Technology Corporation, 1996. TR-96-11.ps.Z (Compressed PostScript, 67k) Roberto J. Bayardo Jr.. Proposes a method for annotating query plans with additional operators in order to efficiently produce the query result in the form of a directionally reduced acyclic database.
